text: The 2019–20 season is Al-Ittihad's 44th consecutive season in the top flight of Saudi football and 93rd year in existence as a football club. The club will participate in the Pro League, the King Cup, the 2019 AFC Champions League and the Arab Club Champions Cup. The season covers the period from 1 July 2019 to 30 June 2020. ==Players== ===Squad information=== ===Out on loan=== ==Transfers and loans== ===Transfers in=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
